6ce4d8495.author: B. Yan
6ce4d8495.msg: Changes in Odin II on three aspects: for loop support, AST simplification and hard block reduction. Odin can support basic for loop statements now. AST simplification includes three parts: expression reduction, for simplifying expressions with variables in it; parameters reduction, for changing the parameters in AST if their values have been set; and replacing with shifts operation, for replacing multiplications or divisions with shifts if the number is a power of two. With hard block reduction, the number of atoms can be reduced.
